It now takes 469 GB of HD space to run a full #Bitcoin node. 40GB for #Litecoin & 36 GB to run a full #DigiByte node. COD #Warzone now takes 90 GB of space. By adding "prune=500" to any $BTC, $LTC or $DGB node you can limit space to 500 MB locally & still help secure chains.
